data.text:
We stayed here as a family to visit Ephesus. Hotel check-in was easy and quick. The lobby was clean and stylish, with a spa-like diffuser somewhere, giving off a nice inviting scent. We booked a family room with two separate bedroom areas and two en-suite bathrooms. Perfect amount of space with a small balcony. Since the weather was transitional between cold and cool, the heat was on, making our rooms a bit warm (centrally controlled air). We had to open the door to the balcony a few times through the night, fighting the constant smell of cigarette smoke outside, to cool off a room to make it more comfortable. Our room faced the road, so it was quite noisy well into the night. Many cars had loud speakers with political mumbo jumbo, ahead of the future election. Beds were rock hard but the hotel did have a menu of pillows. I asked for some different ones, but the staff just brought up some random pillows, so I’m not sure if the pillow menu is really a thing. Staff at the front desk was quiet but nice, but the dining room staff was much nicer and accommodating. Breakfast was great! Lots to pick from but I highly recommend the flaky croissant-like balls local to Izmir, the check board brown/cream semi-sweet bars, and the wettest fudgy cake I’ve ever eaten!!! We loved breakfast! 
Also important to note, the hotel is in a fantastic area for walking. We walked to the bazaar, the pier, and to a restaurant around the corner. Lots of restaurants to pick from! Great value for the money, satisfying breakfast, walkability, but overall, we didn’t feel rested after we left with the hard beds, smoky air from outside, and loud environment.
data.title: Nice, clean, great for families

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. Melissa,

Thank you very much for sharing your positive and inconvenience experience at En Hotel.

We are delighted to hear that you found our team members to be helpful, our lobby clean, stylish, nice scented, our hotel well located. We are also pleased that you enjoyed our breakfast. It is always appreciated to have positive comments from our guests.

We are truly sorry to hear for the issue you've experienced with air-conditioning, cigarette smoke and noise from outside. Our air -conditioning system is central controlled as you've said but you may turn it off whenever needed. Our hotel's beds are orthopedic and there are extra mattress pads on them to make them soften but sometimes this may not well enough to meet the expectations. We hope that if you choose to stay with us again in the future, we can work towards earning a higher rating from you and we would offer you a room at non-smoking floor to avoid any smoke from outside. Your satisfaction is important to us, and we look forward to serving you better on your next visit.
owner_response.author: En Hotel Boutique İzmir

data.text: Murat can ve Hatice ve herkes, çok teşekkür ederim. This is a really kind and thoughtful hotel. So stylish with attention to detail. They cared for my car so I didn't worry about parking. Highly recommend.
data.title: En GUZEL otel İzmir, highly recommend

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your glowing review for Hotel and our staff! We're delighted to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us. Our team works hard to provide exceptional service, and it's always rewarding to receive such positive feedback.  Thank you once again for choosing En Hotel. We truly appreciate your recommendation. Kind regards.
owner_response.author: En Hotel Boutique İzmir

data.text: This new hotel is very close to Bazaar and Passport. The lobby is gorgeous and luxury. The rooms are clean with many modern amenities but especially the triple room is a bit small . The cheaper rooms have a very small balcony and you have to keep the lights on all the time. The breakfast buffet is not bad but for a four star hotel I think that it would have more choices . The staff was very friendly and helpful.
data.title: I expected more for a four star hotel.

data.text: The location is wonderful, the service and food are on top, but what I loved the most is the hospitality of the employees! I would definitely come and stay here again and recommend my family and friends to choose this place for their vacation!
data.title: Great holiday experience in En Hotel Izmir

data.text: Supper modern and chic hotel in a very convenient location. Close to the Bazar and many water front restaurants. The family room consisted of two spacious rooms each with its own full bath. The staff were friendly and helpful. We truly enjoyed our short stay.
data.title: Modern Hotel Close to Everything
